Name: Palaeo_Modern
Description: Indicates whether the data is from fossil (Palaeo) or modern (Modern) records

Name: Original_taxa
Description: Original taxonomic name as recorded in the dataset

Name: Species_pollen_type
Description: Species name of the pollen type

Name: Pollen_type_SM_morphological
Description: Morphological harmonisation of the pollen type (carried out by Saúl Manzano (SM))

Name: Observations_SM
Description: Observations on the pollen type harmonisation (by Saúl Manzano (SM))

Name: Fossil_Sequences_dated
Description: Number of dated fossil records in which the original pollen type is present

Name: Fossil_Sequences_not_dated
Description: Number of undated fossil records in which the original pollen type is present

Name: Modern_Sequences
Description: Number of modern records in which the original pollen type is present

Name: Total_Sequences
Description: Total number of records in which the original pollen type is present

Name: Phytogeographical_affinity
Description: Phytogeographical affinity of the pollen type

Name: Phytogeographical_affinity_GBIF
Description: Phytogeographical affinity based on Global Biodiversity Information Facility (GBIF: https://www.gbif.org/) website

Name: Phytogeographical_affinity_POWO
Description: Phytogeographical affinity based on Plants of the World Online (POWO: https://powo.science.kew.org/) website

Name: Habit_life_form
Description: Life form or life habit of the plant

Name: Habit_summarised
Description: Summarised habit category for percentage calculations

Name: Pollen_type_Lezine_2009
Description: Pollen type classification from Lézine et al. (2009)

Name: Pollen_habit_Lezine_2009
Description: Pollen habit classification from Lézine et al.(2009)

Name: Pollen_type_Mottl_2020
Description: Pollen type classification from Mottl et al.(2020)

Name: No_spp_Vincens_2007
Description: Number of species in Vincens et al. (2007)

Name: Habit_Vincens_2007
Description: Habit classification from Vincens et al. (2007)

Name: Phytogeographical_affinity_Vincens_2007
Description: Phytogeographical affinity from Vincens et al. (2007)

Name: Habitat_Vincens_2007
Description: Habitat classification from Vincens et al. (2007)
